Classes

This section shows the different classes used in AERzip. There is only one right now, the CompressedFileHeader class.

class AERzip.CompressedFileHeader.CompressedFileHeader(compressor='ZSTD', address_size=4, timestamp_size=4)

Bases: object

Class that collects the main information of a compressed aedat file.

library_version

A string indicating the library version.

Type

string

library_version_length

An int indicating the number of bytes required to store the library_version string.

Type

int

compressor

A string indicating the compressor used.

Type

string

compressor_length

An int indicating the number of bytes required to store the compressor string.

Type

int

address_size

An int indicating the size of the addresses in the compressed file.

Type

int

address_length

An int indicating the number of bytes required to store the address_size.

Type

int

timestamp_size

An int indicating the size of the timestamps in the compressed file.

Type

int

timestamp_length

An int indicating the number of bytes required to store the timestamp_size.

Type

int

end_header

The string that represents the end of the header of the generic aedat files.

Type

string

end_header_length

An int indicating the number of bytes required to store the end_header string.

Type

int

header_size

An int indicating the sum total of the lengths of each field in the header.

Type

int

toBytes()

Constructs a bytearray from each field in the CompressedFileHeader object.

Returns

The CompressedFileHeader object as a bytearray.

Return type

header (bytearray)

Notes

Each field of the header has a fixed position in the returned bytearray.
